title: Kitāb Faḍāʾil ahl al-bayt.|كتاب فضائل اهل البيت
additional_titles: [al-Bāb al-awwal]|al-Bāb al-thānī fī al-ḥaml bi-hi wa-mawlidih|al-Bāb al-thālith fī riḍāʻatih|al-Bāb al-rābiʻ fī mabʻathih|al-Bāb al-khāmis fī nikāḥih|al-Bāb al-sādis fī faḍl Fāṭimah|al-Bāb al-sābiʻ fī dhikr azwājih|al-Bāb al-thāmin fī faḍl ʻAlī|al-Bāb al-ʻāshir fī akhbār Abī al-Ḥusayn Zaydi ibn ʻAlī ibn al-Ḥusayn|Colophon
